body: Handling of device pointers should really be done by the sycl compiler and in eigen, in order to avoid opening a can or worms in TensorFlow.
body_html: Handling of device pointers should really be done by the sycl compiler and in eigen, in order to avoid opening a can or worms in TensorFlow.
